launchMode = standard launchMode = singleTop Only one instance of this activity stays on top. Another fresh instance of this activity will not launch when this activity is already showing. launchMode = singleTask Launches activity in new task. Any activity launched above it is destroyed if this activity is called again, in the same task. launchMode = singleInstance Only one instance of this activity will be present in the task, any new activity will be launched in other task. Calling this activity again will destroy activities called after this. launchMode = singleInstancePerTask Unlike \"singleInstance\", activities can be launched on top. New instance will not destroy activities on top ONLY IF \"multiple tasks\" flag is enabled.
